subtitle: A tasty and healthy dish to serve for your guests.

method.text: Cut the chicken into cubes. Place in a bowl with the soy sauce. Toss well to coat. Leave to marinate for 15 min.
Heat the vegetable oil in a large saucepan. Add the garlic and ginger. Fry for 1 min. Add the carrots and beans to the pan. Fry for 5 min, stirring frequently. Remove from pan and set aside.

Add the chicken and any remaining marinade to the pan. Fry for 8-10 min, stirring frequently until cooked. Return vegetables to the pan. Add the chestnuts, stock, remaining soy sauce, sugar and seasoning. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 10 min.
Stir in the bean sprouts. Heat through for 5 min.
Mix the arrowroot with enough cold water to form a smooth paste. Stir into the pan. Simmer for 2-3 min or until thickened.
Spoon the stew into a warmed serving bowl.

title: Japanese chicken and chestnut stew
